snippet: Thousands of ultraconservative Salafist Muslims, angered by an art exhibition they say insults Islam, rampaged through parts of Tunis and other cities on Tuesday.
abstract: Thousands of ultraconservative Salafist Muslims rampage through parts of Tunis and other Tunisian cities, expressing anger over an art exhibition they say insults Islam.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of ultraconservative Salafist Muslims, angered by an art exhibition they say insults Islam, rampaged through parts of Tunis and other cities on Tuesday.

headline.main: Tunisia: Conservative Islamists Riot Over Art Exhibit
headline.print_headline: Tunisia: Conservative Islamists Riot Over Art Exhibit
